extension.summary: Plex Media Server as a Docker container
extension.description:
Plex organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart televisions, streaming boxes and mobile devices.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
